meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.content: USD 505 Chetopa-St. Paul is a school district serving the communities of St. Paul and Chetopa, KS. Contact us for more information.

meta.name: KEYWORDS

li.a: Board of Education Minutes and Agendas

strong.span: Ensuring Bright Futures for Our Students

td.p: At USD 505, our mission is to provide an environment which offers every student the opportunity to receive a meaningful education.
Students completing the USD 505 school program will:

ul.li: Improve academic, vocational, and life skills
Develop good physical, mental, and emotional health habits
